### LATIHAN MPDW

## BACA DATA

```{r}
library (readxl)

cs <- read_excel("D:/KULIAH/SEM 5/MPDW/Coffee Shop Sales.xlsx")
```

```{r}
head(cs)
```

## PRODUK KOPI

```{r}
library(dplyr)

category <- "Coffee"

perday <- cs %>%
  filter(product_category == category) %>%
  group_by(transaction_date) %>%
  summarise(total_sales = sum(transaction_qty, na.rm = TRUE))

print(perday)

```

## LINECHART

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(perday, aes(x = transaction_date, y = total_sales)) +
  geom_line(color = "blue") +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = paste("Penjualan Harian", category),
       x = "Tanggal", y = "Total Penjualan")

```
